import img from "../imgs/woman-product.png" import {useState} from "react"; const ProductPage = (props) =>{ // let images = [props.image,...props.images] let images = ["https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2015/04/23/22/00/tree-736885_960_720.jpg","https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/regenbogen-liebes-herz-hintergrund-60045149.jpg"] let [counter,setCounter] = useState(0) console.log(images) const nextImage = () => { if(counter < images.length) { setCounter(counter++) } else if(counter == images.length) { setCounter(0) } } return <>

{props.gender} collection

{props.name}

{props.description !== "" ? props.description : "Compellingly actualize fully researched processes before proactive outsourcing. Progressively syndicate collaborative architectures before cutting-edge services. Completely visualize parallel core competencies rather than exceptional portals."}

{props.price}$

} export default ProductPage
